description:
Prosecutors in the American city of Baltimore have announced charges against six police officers in connection with the death in police custody of an African-American man Freddie Gray. The charges range from second-degree murder to assault. Within the past half hour President Obama said it's absolutely vital the truth comes out.

The Nepali information minister has admitted that his government's preparedness for the Saturday's catastrophic earthquake was inadequate. Speaking to the BBC Minendra Rijal suggested too much time had been spent on seminars that were not much use.

More than 200 people have been arrested in Turkey during May Day protest in Istanbul. The rallies are the first major protest in Turkey since the government passed a controversial law, giving police increased powers to act against demonstrators.

The American soul and R&B singer Ben E. King has died at the age of 76. He's best known for his hit Stand by Me, the fourth most played track of the 20th century on US radio and television.

The family of a young Indian girl who died after being thrown off a bus following an alleged attempt to molest her, has refused financial compensation from the government. The father of the girl said she wanted justice and not money.

title: 新闻串烧（有声）

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

Aly & A.J.
组合名，由现年24岁的姐姐Alyson Renae "Aly" Michalka（1989年3月25日出生）与现年22岁的妹妹Amanda Joy "AJ" Michalka"（1991年4月10日出生）所组成的Aly&AJ。
两人从小就在教堂的唱诗班中训练歌唱技巧。Aly在六岁始学钢琴弹奏，13岁时兼著把玩吉他，同时展开演戏生涯，AJ同样会吉他与钢琴外，更是模特儿与演员。从迪士尼频道出身的Aly&AJ，演过多出戏剧以及演唱多支单曲出现在剧集当中，虽然年纪轻轻，但早已身经百战朝著全方位艺人阔步迈进。
两人在2005年热播影片《冰雪公主》中演唱主题曲no one，并在此后发行了专辑into the rush。此外，他们还为《少年魔法师》这部电视剧演唱了主题曲do you believe in magic。二人组合现已更名为78violet，第三张专辑将于2013年发行。
